step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with your arms stretched overhead and fingers open. Keep this position for the next step.
You're doing well with the arm stretch overhead. Ensure you're exhaling and relaxing fully as you return to this position.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together while pushing down. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this part.
Excellent work stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Focus on a smooth, relaxed return to this position.
You're consistently performing the movements. Keep up the good work with the full range of motion in each repetition.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to fully stretch your arms overhead and make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Keep up the good work with each repetition.
